scenario.name: Register Load Test
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field5]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [field2]:[field3];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field5]@[field4]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3]>;expires=864000 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] User-Agent: sipp
v=0 o=sipp 53655765 1 IN IP4 [field2] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=ptime:20

ACK sip:[field5]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [field2]:[field3];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field5]@[field4]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3]>;expires=864000 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: sipp

BYE sip:[field5]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [field2]:[field3];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field5]@[field4]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3]>;expires=864000 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: sipp

ACK sip:[field5]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [field2]:[field3];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field5]@[field4]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[field3]>;expires=864000 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: sipp
